website_summaries.verdict: If you only cook for one or two people, or want a slow cooker for preparing side dishes and casseroles, this Crock-Pot is for you.
pros: Locking lid means you can easily transport the cooker to a potluck or family gathering
The mini size and oval shape are perfect for casseroles
cons: None to speak of, but be aware that this is a much smaller Crock-Pot than the most popular models, so it's not suitable for large batches of food

customer_reviews.title: Quality Control appears to be lacking after opening my order
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely excited to receive my mini crockpot until I opened it and found a note from the previous customer who purchased this inside the crockpot pointing out the imperfection in the glass insert. The insert is white and there are black marks all along the outside as well. This company must have received the item back and put it back in circulation without even checking why it was returned since the note was still inside the crockpot from the previous customer. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product.
customer_reviews.text: returned the first one because lid latch broke the first time I fastened it. they sent a new one and I used it once and it did not heat he second time I tried to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Pinklady

customer_reviews.title: Great size!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for potlucks at work. It doesn't weigh a ton so it is much easier to carry around. I had already checked local stores for this item and had not been able to find it, so ordered on here. The weekend after, I found them at my local big box store for twenty dollars, which was ten less than I paid on here. I just wish this was available as a digital crock that would automatically go to warm after a set amount of time - it's the perfect size for cooking for two, or cooking the meat for a small family.
customer_reviews.author: StefiTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice crockpot, just the right size for empty nesters
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice crockpot, just the right size for empty nesters. I have one daughter left at home, and was having trouble getting used to cooking for just two. With this new item, I cut my crockpot recipes in half, and the result is just enough food for two meals (instead of about six!). It looks nice on the countertop, and it's easy to transport if you want to bring it somewhere with you. Great item!
customer_reviews.author: Marie A. Carmenati

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for me! Although this is geared towards casseroles, it works just like a regular crockpot. I used it yesterday for a pork tenderloin roast and today for some tri tip steaks. Great for a smaller household - two to three servings of meat. It has a see-through lid and although the instructions say not to clip the clamps while cooking, by clamping them, it totally eliminates the clattering of the lid. My daughter has a similar one only bigger and the clamped lid really helps. My old crock pot would literally bubble up with steam and rattle the lid, often leaving little puddles on the counter. Not so with this one - very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: C. Munoz

customer_reviews.title: This product should be recalled. Amazon needs to take it off of there site.
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY, DANGERUS PRODUCT. The rivet holding the top locking handle came off and landed in our food. Look at the photo. From the day we got this thing. This cooker sat on a counter. my wife hand washed it after every use so it wasn't misused.
customer_reviews.author: Chris T

customer_reviews.title: It looks like a used Crockpot
customer_reviews.text: It looks like a used Crockpot. I am so disappointed. I found dirts on the electronical line, finger prints on the glass cover. This is in Seoul, Korea. So it is difficult tto return.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Han

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive my crockpot that I bought to use for appitizers/ keeping them warm. I decided to try cooking a small 2 1/2 # roast with 4 carrots and 2 potatoes being there are only two of us. I cooked it on high for 1 hour. Then I cooked it for another 7 hours on low,. When we went to eat dinner. We really could not eat it. The meat was cooked but too tough to eat. The vegetables (carrot, potato and onion) were 3/4 raw still. Something is seriously wrong with this crock pot. Things shold have cooked after that many hours. I am so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta A Valentino

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than average, compact crock pot
customer_reviews.text: Good size for two, lovely design & easy to clean thanks to the ceramic insert that is oven safe. My only two complaints are: 1. Should have an 'on' light bc I want sure if it was working till I touched the sides. 2. though the latches on the glass cover is handy, the metal springs require manual adjustment to clip on/off, not so great when it is hot to handle.
customer_reviews.author: hchou

customer_reviews.title: Arrived already used by someone else
customer_reviews.text: There is food under the lid of the crock pot that is not mine. I just tried it for the first time, and there is a sunflower seed shell in the clear underside of the lid that is not mine. I see others have had this pre-used problem as well. I am sending back. Seems to be a repeat problem with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Kay

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE This!
customer_reviews.text: What a perfect size to cook for one or two! It is compact but big enough to put a whole chicken into, cute and pretty, lightweight for arthritic hands and wrists, easy to clean, and so versatile. This is the best gift I have given myself in a long time and a wonderful investment in my kitchen. would make a wonderful gift for anyone you love too.
customer_reviews.author: JMS

customer_reviews.title: Great size for 2 or 3 people. Nice quality.
customer_reviews.text: We needed a smaller crock for our camper. The one fit nicely without hogging space. It was in good condition and worked fine. It's just the right size for us plus one grand camping. It reheats food we cooked at home (great timesaver) so we can focus on daily activities, not worrying about what to cook and using our camp time doing it.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Pritchett

customer_reviews.title: Nice size, bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Great size, very cute design and love that you can travel with it. I have liked having a smaller crockpot for smaller meals. Only issue I have is that there are several imperfections. I wonder how well the crock will last since the coating is not on the black imperfections. I tried to exchange but they no longer have new ones to exchange. I’d rather keep then return altogether bc I do like the size and style. Hoping it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Reasons

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 2 people, dips, and side dishes
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge fan of crock pots and this little mini is the perfect addition to my collection. It's great now that the kids are gone and I am cooking for two. It's also great for dips and side dishes when the family visits.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Harris

customer_reviews.title: ... first Mini size for me to have and I love this. Power is enough to cook and this ...
customer_reviews.text: This is first Mini size for me to have and I love this. Power is enough to cook and this is just good size for my husband and I. I often use for making breakfast (apple + oats) and that is yummy.
customer_reviews.author: Miyuki G.Top Contributor: Quilting

customer_reviews.title: Good size but outside gets too hot.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the size and the removable dish. I returned it because it took way too long to heat up. It took 45 minutes to melt 8 ounces of cream cheese on the high setting. Weird thing is the outside got extremely hot to the touch.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Kaiser

customer_reviews.title: Great crockpot!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly the size crockpot I needed! I cook for one and the traditional crockpot sizes were just too big for the small amounts I cook now. I’m doing low carb and I can now have dinner waiting when I come home. I’m saving money as well. I buy a regular size piece of meat and ask the butcher to divide it into three sections. I cook one section and freeze the other two instead of having to cook the entire piece. This crockpot is perfect for one or two people! I love this crockpot! It is exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: JDarbs

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the single cook!
customer_reviews.text: I work, so I prepare and freeze a lot of meals because I don't particularly like fast food. I tried a small, round crockpot but I couldn't get my frozen meals inside without defrosting, or hacking a corner off. Now my frozen meats, casseroles, soups and stews lay flay against the bottom, there is plenty of room. And when I travel, the clamps keep the food from spilling in the car. This is perfect for someone who only cooks for 1-2 people.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Didn't get to use this even once before the clamp on the lid snapped off
customer_reviews.text: I am so sorry I purchased this. I have several Crockpots, and have never had one as poorly-constructed as this one. I tried to use it once. I had food in the crock, and realized that the lid sat on top of the crock so loosely that I was concerned the food would not cook properly. I therefore tried to fasten the clamps that are attached to the lid. The one I tried to fasten snapped off, and the flimsy screw that held it in place flew into the air. I tried reattaching the screw, but it was impossible. This purchase was a great disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Constant Reader

customer_reviews.title: Pop Goes the Crockpot
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two of these 2.5 qt. crock pots at the beginning of November. All was well until. . .it wasn't. Currently the end of February, one crockpot is unusable. There was a loud POP while simmering chicken soup on low and the crock liner is no more. Note the small hole in the body of the crockpot. Can reliably report it works perfectly. ANY liquids will rapidly exit a fractured crock liner and spread everywhere. Happy dogs. They adore chicken soup. Buy this crockpot casserole, take your chances. We did. And lost.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lid was defective
customer_reviews.text: The rubber seal on the lid was improperly installed on the lid when I got it. It was rolled back from the edge of the lid and dangling. I've bought other Crock Pot items with no problems. I was very disappointed. It is a bit smaller than expected, but would have been perfect for two people.
customer_reviews.author: SJS

customer_reviews.title: No issues after over a year of use
customer_reviews.text: I got my Crock Pot in January 2019. I am single and don't often make large batches of food. This little guy works fine for me. I did a 1.2 pound chuck roast in it today. I have had to adjust the timing of most recipes. With the smaller size, the food seems to cook faster. My chuck roast was done in 5 hours on low instead of the normal 6 to 8 hours. Rarely use my big Crock Pot anymore.
customer_reviews.author: CitizenOfTheValley

customer_reviews.title: Good for couples
customer_reviews.text: If you are used to cooking for a small army of hungry family members, downsizing to two people is hard. This is a good sized crockpot for two. It does a generous "Bowl" of stew, etc. or it can do entree sized portions for 3-4. Because of the size, it cooks rather quickly, IMHO, so you can use the lower heat setting if you are dropping in stuff and leaving for work.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie Reader

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for smaller casseroles
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for small casseroles and to take to a potluck or just for freeing up the oven for other baking. It is easy to clean because of the crock that comes out. Also, the crock can be used to bake in the oven and just warm up when placed in the slow cooker. The warm works great for keeping casseroles warm for a potluck. I made sweet potatoes in the crock in the oven and then used this to warm it up at a work pot luck. The lid closes tightly so when you are transporting in your vehicle, it won't spill out. I love this small casserole slow cooker.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for smaller meals
customer_reviews.text: Loving crockpot cooking as i do, I longed for a medium sized pot for making meals for 1 or 2. ( already have an even smaller one but needed one in between to fit slightly larger ingredients. This fits the bill and works perfectly. Holds enough for a hearty chicken veggie soup, with the carcass and complete cut up chicken plus sufficient space for two containers of stock and lots of veggies. - something the smaller one doesn’t . Very pleased and recommend
customer_reviews.author: E S BROWN

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for cooking for two
customer_reviews.text: Love that it has multiple settings. We have 3 crock pots. One just for smells good(no settings). This one is great for small group cooking and unlike our larger one the pot is lightweight enough that it isn't a struggle to pick up the pottery liner and clean. Being older I appreciate that as my upper body strength seems to dwindle a little more each year. :)
customer_reviews.author: Kuari and Pogo

customer_reviews.title: I thought this product was fantastic..
customer_reviews.text: Initially, I thought this product was fantastic....then the HIGH setting stopped working. Super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Angela V.

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I love,love love this for keeping appetizers warm, or for making casserole for my husband and myself! It is the perfect size when you want a small crockpot and it looks attractive when you set it on a serving line!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Crockpot
customer_reviews.text: We've used this four times, and really like it. For just the two of us it's the perfect size. We cooked a three pound chuck roast tonight, it came out perfectly. The 'crock' is oval. If I need a 9x13" pan it will go into the oven, then store in the 'fridge. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie’sMom

customer_reviews.title: I recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I love my new crock pot. Came very well packaged. So cute, I leave it on the counter..has the French Country look that I love. The perfect size for two people. I haven't used it yet but very happy that I purchased this particular design. I love the size. Will be easy to clean because of the size. Much better for us than the heavy, large six quart stone crock pot that we have used in the past. I especially like the safety handles on the lid. Will be nice for transporting .
customer_reviews.author: donna w

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't cook without it!
customer_reviews.text: I get teased regularly that I'd starve if I didn't have my crock pot that cooks casseroles. But I don't cook cassaroles in it. I cook everything else though! It makes just enough for a couple of meals plus some to share. It is capable of cooking faster than my other crock pots which helps when I forget to start early, It's my favorite of all 5 crock pots!
customer_reviews.author: Pink Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Worked great, food looked better than traditional crock pots.
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can make smaller casseroles for the two of us. In my small taller crock pot everything came out pretty messy. In this one a casserole looks like a casserole. It heated evenly (better than the big size casserole one.) I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Since there is just my husband and me, it is the right size for what we need to eat, or to carry to a gathering. I like the fact that it locks shut, so there are no spills. Of course, with glass type containers, I do not expect a problem with food odors, etc., but it cleans up so easy--in sink or dishwasher. Before I even knew how well it cooks, I liked the bright, pretty design of the outside.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Awesome crackpot for smaller families
customer_reviews.text: We own the bigger one but it is too big to use unless you have a lot of people. We used this one for dressing on Thanksgiving. It makes pulled pork for 4 with no problem, The cooker has a small footprint and stores in the 12" kitchen cabinet with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Cornell

customer_reviews.title: Name brand should perform constently all the time, but it does not. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and the way the cover locks into place. I dislike the fact that the heating element is not consistent. Sometimes it is hot and other times it seems to take forever for it to completely cook/warm up food
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Nice for a small no frills crock pot
customer_reviews.text: This is nice for when you have to take a small side to a pot luck or if you are making a small meal for just two people. It is what it says it is - not frills. It is a little smaller than I expected, but it's nice.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Very handy for small amounts.  Works very well.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a smaller crockpot for small batches of food. My other units are 4 and 6 quarts, which is overkill for things like dips or cereals cooked overnight or small batches of food for two people. This unit admirably fills the bill. No problems in the three times I've used it so far. I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Faye Sproul

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Two plus
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my husband and I!! Stylish...goes from cooking to serving easily. I love that it’s not so deep, so our meals don’t get lost in a traditional crockpot...more like a casserole dish... my favorite is to put shredded chicken with a jar of green chili salsa and have delicious taco meat ready for dinner when I get home from work!
customer_reviews.author: Cinny D

customer_reviews.title: Really like this Crockpot!
customer_reviews.text: Being empty nesters, it seemed like all of my crockpots were too big and bulky for smaller sized recipes. Cooking for 2 is a big enough hassle, let alone having big slow cookers take up space in the cupboards. This works great and is a better size for a two-person household. I LOVE IT. Currently it is on the counter top cooking Swedish meatballs for dinner! It also is attractive and looks nice when taking it to potlucks and parties.
customer_reviews.author: Vanderski

customer_reviews.title: It was a perfect size for the amount I needed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item to make queso dip for Christmas. It was a perfect size for the amount I needed. It looks nice and love the snap tight lid. Update: I have had this now for 2 yrs and I'm still in love with this. I made Thanksgiving dinner yesterday and made creamed fiesta corn in it. It was once again a perfect size and it turned out perfect. I used 6 cups of corn plus the liquid and it fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Janice M. S.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This crock pot is the perfect size! Not too big, not too small. Fits 2 chicken breasts and veggies perfectly! Easy to clean and store. Definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Crockpot
customer_reviews.text: Am very disappointed with the crockpot as it doesn't work. I cooked fresh stringbeans on high for 6-1/2 hrs and they were still crunchy. Can't return it as I was so sure it would be fine that I threw away all the packaging. Was so looking forward to getting it but am very disappointed. Any suggestions as to what I can do?
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: Locking crock pot
customer_reviews.text: This is a great idea so that nothing spills if you need to travel with your food. I bought it because it was smaller. I love crock pots and use them once a week. They are great so that I don't even have to worry about when dinner is ready. I can make it ahead of time... love my crock.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Perfect party serveware
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for a side dish or appetizer. Will use it for the cocktail meatballs the I'm often asked to bring to parties. I can make them the day before and put them in the fridge right in the removable crock them heat them up before serving. Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Super for supper and sides!
customer_reviews.text: Can one really have too many crackpots? This is a perfect lightweight midsized addition to our collection
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The thinning nest
customer_reviews.text: As a 30 year user, I appreciate the different sizes for different needs. This one focuses on just the 2 of us outside family gatherings. Great for 1 or 2 people!
customer_reviews.author: Christi

customer_reviews.title: Just right for 1 or 2
customer_reviews.text: I have a big crock pot, but seems like wasted space for smaller recipes, and I have trouble lifting it. This smaller one is just right for things like smothered pork chops for 2. It cooks in about the same time as my big one, 4 hours on high for most things. I’ll still use my big one for big batch soups, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Velasquez

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Came with lid handle broken. How do I get another?
customer_reviews.author: Austin Emery

customer_reviews.title: Use this a couple times a week, and love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I cook chicken thighs, also sweet potatoes, separately, for my senior dog, two to three times a week. This makes it so simple and doesn't heat up the house. This has also worked for making a dish of Chicken Enchiladas without using the big oven. I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Collier

customer_reviews.title: Great product for 1-4 servings 1-3 people.
customer_reviews.text: Easy cleanup. Runs a little high as far as temperature goes. Like any other slow cooker, get to know how long to cook and which temperature to use. Makes 2-4 servings. Roast and similar meals 2 servings. Soups and similar meals 4 servings. Great 2-3 people depending on the meal and individual appetite.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Cute and is perfect for 2
customer_reviews.text: I went from a 7 qt to a 4 and now this little guy. It's so cute-- don't know why they don't make more decorated ones-- and is perfect for the 2 of us. I usually cut recipes in half for us, and this is the perfect size normal sized recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Loo

customer_reviews.title: Not What I Hoped For
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing. The very first time I used it, the lid closure completely popped off on one side. When I got a replacement one, the lid closures were too short and wouldn't lock down at all. Dumped it, and bought an Instant Pot instead.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This was absolutely perfect for the dip I made for a party at my cousin's house. The seal was top notch, very simple to clean and was hot enough on warm to still enjoy the dip for hours. I highly recommend this for something on the small scale such as spinach artichoke dip or buffalo chicken dip.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love this 2.5 Crockpot. It’s exactly what I need for parties where I am not filling my 6 qt. Crockpot. Love the locking lid feature and it cleans up nicely. Thanks for the immediate turnaround exchange when I’d found a blemish in my original shipment.
customer_reviews.author: ElementaryComputers

customer_reviews.title: What a perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: It can do everything that large Crockpot can do! I am single, I make small beef and pork roasts, or 3 large chicken breasts. I get three meals out of each batch. It fits so conveniently on my counter as well. I love Crockpots!
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Love this casserole crock-pot!
customer_reviews.text: Good size for 1 or 2 people. It's pretty easy to clean, but the sides are a bit discolored now. I thought it was because the crockery is white, but I've seen the black ones do it too.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Love this crockpot!
customer_reviews.text: I love this casserole crockpot! It is perfect for two or three people. It is versatile and I cooks about anything I want. I made a dump apple crisp yesterday and it turned out perfectly! It's one of my favorites!
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis

customer_reviews.title: Good Price, Great Size!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. It is perfect for two people and I find that I use it at least once a week. The size makes it easy to clean and store - we got rid of our large one because it was so large, hard to clean and there was no place to store it. Very good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: ELIZABETH

customer_reviews.title: Crockpot
customer_reviews.text: I have not used this more than twice, and found it has to be on high in order to cook anything, also takes at least six hours...glad I kept my 20 year old crockpot...it works much better...this will serve for keeping dishes warm only!
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: ENJOYING THIS NEW SLOW COOKER
customer_reviews.text: I am using this smaller slow cooker for many things. There are just 2 of us so often don't need the big one. My husband took it to pot luck with just enough to share. Great that it is easy to lock and carry. Be careful of sides being HOT..... I love that I can cook two chicken breasts in it......when I want for dinner. Easy to clean smaller crock. SO glad I bought it ..
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect “casserole” size crockpot!
customer_reviews.text: Love the size and look of this crockpot! Perfect for cooking for just the two of us. Yes, I have the usual large crockpot but it’s bulky and when just wanting to cook us a smaller roast or chicken with veggies, stews, etc., this is so much better. Works wonderfully!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda McG.

customer_reviews.title: PEFECT SIZE FOR TWO
customer_reviews.text: It's just me and my husband now. And since we are empty nesters we no longer really need the bigger crockpot so this one is the perfect size. I've used it a few times and it cooks great and cleans up well.
customer_reviews.author: agwalker

customer_reviews.title: Great for a mini!
customer_reviews.text: I did return this for the larger casserole one as it wasn't large enough for my needs (I really should have known better). I only used it once, but it worked well. As with most small crocks, it does not heat up as quickly as the larger ones, but did quite well for its size. Would order again if needed one this small.
customer_reviews.author: Mel K.

customer_reviews.title: Convenient carry size
customer_reviews.text: Lock broke after a few uses. Replacement top doesn’t have lock feature. Great size for carrying out to parties.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Nyland

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great deal for a great price , for the smaller family
customer_reviews.text: I really like this small crockpot as it is good , for one or two people to enjoy a meal It is colorful and sturdy. The locks keep the pot together while cooking or moving the crockpot around It makes a nice gift for seniors or single people
customer_reviews.author: Linda Annis

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect slow cooker for 2. I have many different sized slow cookers, but this one is getting a workout. It is the perfect size for dinner for my husband and I and a great size for party appetizers and dips! I have given several as gifts too!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy - Omaha, NE

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for bringing appetizers or slow cooking a meal for 4! I wanted something shallow and was so happy to find this beautiful crockpot!
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Great small size
customer_reviews.text: Since it's now just the 2 of us to cook for (most days) - hauling out a huge Crock Pot wasn't ideal. I love this smaller size! Just made a small baked ham and it turned out great.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Altemus

customer_reviews.title: Love It!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this!! Perfect for hot appetizer dips for a party or for a smaller family. Very attractive looking too. So glad I bought this! My friends all want to know where I got it.
customer_reviews.author: B. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It is small so perfect for my apartment. It can make about 2-3 meals and can easily be put in the dishwasher to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Good size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for single or couple meals or side dishes. Good for hot party dip appetizers. Just what I was looking for. 👍
customer_reviews.author: D. Short

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt heat
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't seem to get as hot as it should. I may have to pre cook stuff. Kind of defeats the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy. Defective. Used before.
customer_reviews.text: Defective product and came dirty. I didn’t get a chance to use this until after several weeks of ordering so didn’t notice these issues at first glance. When trying to close the lid it’s clear that on one side the metal is defective and will never allow the lid to close. It also came dirty and clearly has been used before. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Space Saver
customer_reviews.text: Nice little crockpot with locking lid for travel. Saves space and fits easily in a pantry. Not going to get more than a couple pieces of bone-in chicken so make sure you have a need for small portions.
customer_reviews.author: William F. Collins III

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Three 7-hour days on high to cook a small stew...it never did bubble. I had to finally finish in microwave. Please I love the size and shape, how do I register a complaint for a possible replacement, if this is because it is defective, rather than a bad choice.
customer_reviews.author: Pelican 4465

customer_reviews.title: Great price, cute appearance, takes way too long to cook something.
customer_reviews.text: I love the size. Well made. Really cute! The only thing I dont like is that it takes a very long time to cook something. Ive always used slow cookers but nothing this slow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the size and the even cooking
customer_reviews.text: Love the size and the even cooking, however, only 4 stars because the first time I locked down the lid one of the rivets broke. Instead of sending back, I sent put a small bolt through with locking nut washer on the other side and I actually feel it is more secure now.
customer_reviews.author: Rita B.

customer_reviews.title: So good  I bought 2 more For the holidays
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for making smaller size portions And also makes a great buffet We warmer. The stoneware crock can be pulled out of the unit in used in the oven as well
customer_reviews.author: Camry Man

customer_reviews.title: Favorite small crockpot I have ever had, use it almost weekly
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite crockpot ever! I love the size of it and how it locks down. I’ve had another one before, this is the second time I have ordered it. Love love love! Perfect for dips
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I used it tonight for ribs and it worked great. Clean up even with barbecue sauce was quick ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. I needed a new small crockpot and wanted one that was more horizontal than vertical. This fit the bill perfectly. I used it tonight for ribs and it worked great. Clean up even with barbecue sauce was quick and easy. Highly recommend this crockpot.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for one or two
customer_reviews.text: Gave my large Crock Pot casserole to my sister since she cooks for a family of four and bought this for myself. Perfect size for one or two. Also had one sent to my friend who was recently widowed.
customer_reviews.author: Robi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for my older parents who just want to ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my older parents who just want to put dinner together easily. Doesnt take up much room on the counter and works very well. I purchased the liners to go with this to make clean- up easier.
customer_reviews.author: L.E.

customer_reviews.title: Love this crockpot!
customer_reviews.text: Love this Crockpot casserole cooker. Perfect for a family dinner from cooking to table. Like that you use it like a casserole dish which does cook differently then a deeper crockpot. Love, love, love it. I have 6 crockpots all different sizes. This has become my go to crockpot for main dishes or side dishes.
customer_reviews.author: bluebird

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty and it's different.
customer_reviews.text: It looks really nice in the pic. It was small in real life. I didn't realize it was that small. I made scallop potatoes. I had a lot of left over potatoes that can't fit. Just have to remember to down size crockpot recipes. It's good for parties. You got everyone's attention. It's nice to look at and it has the lid locks. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lily bell

customer_reviews.title: Great small crock pot
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for appetizers or pudding/dump cake desserts. I just love this.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Small Meals
customer_reviews.text: I love this little thing. It is beautiful and functional. I bought it to make small meals for my elderly mother, who does not need a lot of food. I have used it and it cooked everything just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for 2 people you can make a small roast in it etc. The only set back but all crock pots are like this the outside gets hot. So keep it away from small children
customer_reviews.author: Sally G

customer_reviews.title: Great size and shape.l love it
customer_reviews.text: I do not like the lock feature at all.but I love the crock pot. Perfect size for 2 people.i like that its oval shaped.a small roast fits perfect
customer_reviews.author: becca

customer_reviews.title: Works well but the quality is not good. I have used it 3 times and one ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well but the quality is not good. I have used it 3 times and one of the top fasteners came out, just washing it. I do not want to imagin what would have happened if I would have carried it with hot food.
customer_reviews.author: anel ram

customer_reviews.title: My crockpot bit the dust so I figured I'd order ...
customer_reviews.text: My crockpot bit the dust so I figured I'd order a newer and smaller one. Well, I should have looked closer because it really is small. You can only add pieces of meat, not a whole chicken or roast. I've used it a few times but because of the small size, I'll be buying another larger one.
customer_reviews.author: marybethh

customer_reviews.title: Great for my small family
customer_reviews.text: There are three of us and I hate wasting food with the larger pots. This one is perfect for a chunk of roast beef. Love it. I just wish the locking clamps worked when I remove the pot from the warmer.
customer_reviews.author: YallinTroubleNow!

customer_reviews.title: This is no crock, I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a smaller crockpot that would allow me to cook for just two people. I can cook just two pieces of meat or fish without pulling out the huge, heavy crockpot I use for big family dinners. It fits easily into the dishwasher for easy cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Louise E Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Nice for two.
customer_reviews.text: A nice size for two or parties. I wouldn’t try to cook a large roast or even small chicken. It isn’t large enough to Cooke these properly.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Whealton

customer_reviews.title: Junk!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is pure junk! I put a small roast in the crockpot. The handle that snaps down broke off when I was trying to lock it. I did not over fill the crockpot,I am so disappointed that Amazon sells this item! Buyer beware this is junk!
customer_reviews.author: chayce campbell

customer_reviews.title: Love this size and shape
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this size and the shape. Great for potlucks, family dinner for 3 and anything else. Fits larger cuts of meat lengthwise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Basic and functional.
customer_reviews.text: Great size for a single person. I have used.it several times to make Fruit Compotes.- the Fruits cook gently and retain their form. This is a basic CrockPot, no bells & whistles. It works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne M. Derringer

customer_reviews.title: Nice size for 1 or 2 people
customer_reviews.text: Nice size for 1 or 2 people. Because it is small with good surface area and not a lot of depth, food cooks pretty fast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this croc is the perfect size for hot dips (kept my cheesy onion dip ...
customer_reviews.text: this croc is the perfect size for hot dips (kept my cheesy onion dip nice and warm!); Also made country ribs for two of us and it was plenty big enough! --actually it was the perfect size. Ribs came out delicious! the locking lid is a nice feature as is the dishwasher safe insert. got my money's worth on this one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great smaller sized crockpot!
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of this little crock pot wonder! It is perfect for meals for 2 or 3, but is also great for entertaining those dips or sauces that need to stay warm.
customer_reviews.author: Sallygirl

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it 3 times, but it performs just as well as my other crock pots. I like the smaller shallow size for smaller portions.
customer_reviews.author: CoffeeLuva

product_meta.title: Crockpot 2.5-Quart Mini Casserole Crock Slow Cooker, White/Blue
product_meta.description: The Mini Casserole Crock makes dining for smaller dinners, potlucks and parties easier than ever. It's 2.5-Quart capacity is the perfect size and shape to prepare everyone's favorite casserole dishes, lasagna, mac & cheese and desserts. With portability in mind, the Mini Casserole Crock uses our Cook & Carry locking lid system, so you can conveniently take your dish on the go without spills or mess. The removable stoneware is made for versatility too! It can go from countertop to tabletop to simplify serving and can also be placed in a conventional oven to cook and warm food. It's ideal for entertaining to when oven space is limited or when you just don't want to turn on your conventional oven; and, of course, for delicious, make-ahead meals you and your family can come home to.
feature_bullets: 2.5 quart capacity, Removable, oven-safe casserole-shaped stoneware
Come home to a delicious casserole throughout the week
High, Low and Warm Settings to cook and keep food warm. Cord wraps for neat and easy transport
Keeps casseroles warm while serving, Includes lid-mounted clips to secure lid
